conditions.name: Zinc Washout
conditions.description: Participants must discontinue zinc therapy for a minimum period before Day 1.
conditions.text: Previous treatment with zinc within 21 days prior to Day 1.

conditions.name: Chelator Washout
conditions.description: Participants must discontinue chelator therapy prior to initiating ALXN1840.
conditions.text: Participants will be discontinued from their chelator therapy for approximately 4 days prior to initiating ALXN1840.

conditions.name: Experimental Therapy Washout
conditions.description: Participants must have a washout period from other experimental therapies.
conditions.text: The use of an experimental or unapproved/unlicensed therapy at the same time or within 90 days or 5 half-lives, whichever is longer, prior to the Screening Visit.

conditions.name: Prescription Medication Washout
conditions.description: Participants must abstain from prescription medications prior to Day -7.
conditions.text: Participants must abstain from taking prescription medications within 14 days or 5 half-lives (whichever is longer) of Day -7.

conditions.name: Non-Prescription Medication Washout
conditions.description: Participants must abstain from non-prescription drugs, vitamins, and supplements prior to Day -7.
conditions.text: Participants must abstain from nonprescription drugs (including vitamins and dietary or herbal supplements) within 7 days or 5 half-lives (whichever is longer) before Day -7.

conditions.name: Safety Review for Dose Titration
conditions.description: Safety data must be reviewed by the SRC before dose titration.
conditions.text: Before titration to 30 mg/day, the Safety Review Committee (SRC) will review available safety data through Day 23 for each participant.

conditions.name: Outpatient Period Extension
conditions.description: The outpatient period may be extended with Investigator approval.
conditions.text: The Outpatient Period during Treatment Period 1 may be extended up to an additional 14 days with Investigator approval.

conditions.name: ALT > 5x ULN
conditions.description: Criterion for dose discontinuation based on Alanine Aminotransferase levels.

conditions.name: ALT > 3x ULN
conditions.description: Criterion for dose interruption based on Alanine Aminotransferase levels.

conditions.name: Hematologic Abnormality
conditions.description: Criteria for dose reduction based on hemoglobin, platelets, or neutrophils.
conditions.text: Hemoglobin < 10 g/dL or > 30% decrease from baseline; Platelets < 100,000/mm3 or > 30% decrease from baseline; Neutrophils > 30% decrease from baseline and below reference range.

conditions.name: Potential Liver Injury (Hy's Law)
conditions.description: Criterion for temporary dose interruption based on bilirubin and ALT levels.
conditions.text: Bilirubin > 2 × ULN Accompanied by ALT > 3 × ULN

conditions.name: Neurologic Worsening
conditions.description: Clinical evidence of neurologic worsening triggers a review for dose modification.
conditions.text: Evidence of neurologic worsening by AEs or by neurologic physical exam assessment.

conditions.name: Psychiatric Worsening
conditions.description: Clinical evidence of psychiatric worsening triggers a review for dose modification.
conditions.text: Evidence of clinically significant acute psychiatric worsening which may include but not limited to suicidality, acute depression, or psychosis.

conditions.name: Serious Hypersensitivity Reaction
conditions.description: A serious hypersensitivity reaction requires discontinuation of study intervention.

conditions.name: Severe Uncontrolled Infection
conditions.description: A severe uncontrolled infection requires discontinuation of study intervention.

conditions.name: Use of Disallowed Medication
conditions.description: Use of a disallowed medication requires discontinuation of study intervention.

conditions.name: Pregnancy
conditions.description: Pregnancy or planned pregnancy requires discontinuation of study intervention.

transitionRules.name: Dose Titration to 30 mg/day
transitionRules.text: Participants will be administered ALXN1840 at 15 mg/day for a treatment period of approximately 28 days followed by titration up to 30 mg/day on Day 29.

transitionRules.name: Dose Titration Hold
transitionRules.text: Participants may remain on the 15 mg/day dose for the duration of the study if there are safety concerns.

transitionRules.name: Dose Interruption for ALT > 3x ULN
transitionRules.text: If ALT > 3x ULN, dosing is temporarily interrupted.

transitionRules.name: Discontinuation for ALT > 5x ULN
transitionRules.text: If ALT > 5x ULN, discontinue study intervention.

transitionRules.name: Dose Reduction for Hematologic Abnormality
transitionRules.text: If Hemoglobin, Platelets, or Neutrophils meet criteria, reduce dose to previous dose level or to 15 mg QOD.

transitionRules.name: Dose Interruption for Potential Liver Injury
transitionRules.text: If Bilirubin > 2x ULN and ALT > 3x ULN, dosing is temporarily interrupted.

transitionRules.name: Dose Modification for Neurologic/Psychiatric Worsening
transitionRules.text: Investigator and Alexion Medical Monitor will evaluate the need for dose modification (interruption, increase or decrease) based on neurologic or psychiatric worsening.

transitionRules.name: Intervention Discontinuation
transitionRules.text: Participants must be considered for discontinuation from study intervention for: Serious hypersensitivity reaction; Severe uncontrolled infection; Use of disallowed medication; Pregnancy or planned pregnancy; or if Alexion or the Investigator deems it necessary.

scheduleTimelineExits.name: Study Completion
scheduleTimelineExits.description: A participant is considered to have completed the study if he/she has completed all phases of the study including the last scheduled procedure shown in the Schedule of Activities (SoA).

scheduleTimelineExits.name: Participant Withdrawal of Consent
scheduleTimelineExits.description: A participant may withdraw from the study at any time at his/her own request.

scheduleTimelineExits.name: Investigator Discretion Withdrawal
scheduleTimelineExits.description: A participant may be withdrawn at any time at the discretion of the Investigator for safety, behavioral, compliance, or administrative reasons.

scheduleTimelineExits.name: Lost to Follow-up
scheduleTimelineExits.description: A participant will be considered lost to follow-up if he or she repeatedly fails to return for scheduled visits and is unable to be contacted by the study site.

scheduleTimelineExits.name: Sponsor Termination of Study
scheduleTimelineExits.description: Alexion reserves the right to close the study site or terminate the study at any time for any reason.

scheduledDecisionInstances.name: Dose Titration Decision
scheduledDecisionInstances.description: Decision point to titrate dose from 15 mg/day to 30 mg/day, based on safety review.

scheduledDecisionInstances.name: Dose Modification Decision
scheduledDecisionInstances.description: Unscheduled decision point to modify, interrupt, or discontinue dose based on safety lab results or clinical worsening.

scheduledDecisionInstances.name: Intervention Discontinuation Decision
scheduledDecisionInstances.description: Decision to permanently discontinue study intervention based on specific events.
